LanguageData.MarbleMindTD.stages.0.label: mind ward
LanguageData.MarbleMindTD.stages.0.description: My mind is fortified against the troubles to come.
LanguageData.TM_TraitInfusion.stages.0.label: Absorbed traits
LanguageData.TM_TraitInfusion.stages.0.description: These changes make me feel like a stranger to myself, it's going to take some time to rediscover who I am.
